reviews.review: One of the top classic cult games. Half-life 2 episode two is one of the best games ever made and was ahead of its day. The graphics and game play are outstanding.
Best game i've ever played.
Dobre

Excellent.
Half Life 2 Episode 2 is the last expansion released for Half Life 2, with extremely good graphics that have held up well and still the rock solid gameplay Half Life 2 is known for.

Altough there are a few missions which are quite annoying (and a few that make you extremely jumpy due to it being a horror game in a few places) Half Life 2 EP2 is a brilliant game, and a must have for every serious Half Life/FPS fan

El Teorema de PitÃ¡goras es un teorema que nos permite relacionar los tres lados de un triÃ¡ngulo rectÃ¡ngulo, por lo que es de enorme utilidad cuando conocemos dos de ellos y queremos saber el valor del tercero.

Establece que "En todo triÃ¡ngulo rectÃ¡ngulo, la hipotenusa al cuadrado es igual a la suma de los los cuadrados de los catetos"

Entonces, si lo queremos expresar de manera algebrÃ¡ica, serÃ­a algo asÃ­:
cÂ² = aÂ² + bÂ²
"c" siendo la hipotenusa, y "a" y "b" siendo los dos catetos.

As a huge fan of the first Half-Life, I would definitely recommend Half-Life 2: Episode Two, if the series has left you wanting more. I didn't ever play 2 or its expansions at the time of their original release, so I am glad that nowadays I can play catch up. Although enjoyable, it is a bit of a short-lived experience and without giving too much away, I will say that I can see why fans have been so angry over the years that there is still not a proper 3rd instalment.

I now completely understand the crave for a Half-Life 3.
10/10

Opa, sÃ³ registrando aqui 14 anos no futuro: acabei dia 16/06/2021 toda a minha run de half-life e half-life 2; quando esse episodio saiu, eu tinha 7 anos e agora tenho 21. A partir de hoje, comeÃ§o a esperar o 3.

The conclusion to the HL2 story, but leaves you in a huge cliffhanger that has yet to be continued. Although in the beginning it has you fight tons of Antlions, it's in really tricky areas and in moderate numbers, so it feels fun. Then it leaves them and makes you fight zombies and soldiers again. It gives you a car but this time it controls better and it is used in a much better way, add that to better areas to drive themselves and you have a super fun vehicle section. The final battle is really good too, but what shines the most in this Episode are the characters. Loved the interactions and the introduction of the Borealis, which connects directly to the Portal universe. 

Give us Half-Life 3 Valve!
